title: This looks promising: an RNA-based vaccine effective against any strain of a...
content:
This looks promising: an RNA-based vaccine effective against any strain of a virus and works for those with weakened immune system (babies, immunocompromised). â€œThis could be the universal vaccine that we have been looking for.â€
